answers.answer: There's really no way you can slow your belly down from growing.. You're pregnant, you're gonna get big no matter what so might as well get over the fact and then when baby's here you can work on your weight.
I was bloated... it happened to me didn't like it bcuz I'm keeping an eye on my weight but it went away in a week :D then I was back to normal

For the first 2-3 months I stayed bloated. I haven't gained any weight since pregnancy, which I'm over weight to begin with. After the bloat disappeared, I lost weight from everywhere else and since I've done the same just to gain it in my belly. Since April 21st, I've lost gained, but am at the same weight. Could be you'll do the same thing.
